summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services; modifying allocations of federal funds under the HOME program and the Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS program for 1994 and 1995, superseding in part Ordinances 117073 and 117599; accepting and appropriating additional federal HOME funds for 1995; authorizing amendments to the City's 1994 Comprehensive Housing Affordability Strategy, 1994 HOME Program Description and 1995 Consolidated Plan; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
